lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Norman, 101, formerly of Flushing, NY, passed away on Sunday, May 22, 2016. He was married to his wife, Trudy for 69 years. He enjoyed sports and held several leadership positions at the Bayside Jewish Center. He served in the Army and Air Force during World War II. He is also survived by his son, Larry, and his wife Barbara of Wayne, NJ; his daughter, Ellen and her husband, Lenny, of New York, NY; grandchildren, Jason and Sara, and their spouses, Jen and Ben, and great-grandsons, Samuel and Henry. He will be sorely missed. Memorial contributions may be made to the American Macular Degeneration Foundation. 1/3
